com.aionemu.gameserver.dataholders.loadingutils
Class XmlDataLoader

java.lang.Object
  com.aionemu.gameserver.dataholders.loadingutils.XmlDataLoader

public class XmlDataLoader
extends java.lang.Object

This class is responsible for loading xml files. It uses JAXB to do the job.
In addition, it uses @{link XmlMerger to create input file from all xml files.

Author:
Luno
